channel.title: Beasts of Burden
channel.description: I am pretty psyched for @Epidiah making this game over on Twitter right now! > > Here's our deal: > > I write a #ttrpg about a team of asses beholden to reckless adventurers in a land of fearsome fauna, awesome magic & toothsome flora: #𝕭𝖊𝖆𝖘𝖙𝖘𝕺𝖋𝕭𝖚𝖗𝖉𝖊𝖓! > > You set my price & page count! > > RTs ÷ 5 = page count > Likes = price in pennies > PDF-Only https://t.co/8vv3bG9ef6

item.title: Beasts of Burden
item.dc:creator: @cosmicwimp
item.description:
@cosmicwimp wrote:

I am pretty psyched for @Epidiah making this game over on Twitter right now!

Here’s our deal:

I write a #ttrpg about a team of asses beholden to reckless adventurers in a land of fearsome fauna, awesome magic & toothsome flora: #𝕭𝖊𝖆𝖘𝖙𝖘𝕺𝖋𝕭𝖚𝖗𝖉𝖊𝖓!

You set my price & page count!

RTs ÷ 5 = page count
Likes = price in pennies
PDF-Only https://t.co/8vv3bG9ef6
